name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where a malicious PowerShell script was executed to drop a payload and attempt lateral movement.

action--b9c6d1e9-2e54-4318-a08e-6d2737b5.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--b9c6d1e9-2e54-4318-a08e-6d2737b5.description: Terminate the PowerShell process that executed the malicious script.

action--edd3f620-3aed-4c8b-8496-d5c9f721.name: Remove dropped payload
action--edd3f620-3aed-4c8b-8496-d5c9f721.description: Delete the malicious payload if it exists in the Temp directory.

action--5489ae97-ff73-4f4f-a870-2f9b3941.name: Scan all hosts for additional threats
action--5489ae97-ff73-4f4f-a870-2f9b3941.description: Perform an antivirus scan across all hosts in the network.

action--f4abf1d8-2911-42e5-b5ac-0b83b8f7.name: Reset SSH keys
action--f4abf1d8-2911-42e5-b5ac-0b83b8f7.description: Reset SSH keys to prevent further unauthorized access from compromised hosts.

action--9493d198-b0a1-44b5-bad7-19ceecad.name: Block command and scripting interpreter execution
action--9493d198-b0a1-44b5-bad7-19ceecad.description: Restrict execution policy for PowerShell to prevent further executions of scripts.

if-condition--1decf464-35fc-4fc5-bd48-c0.name: Check if the malicious payload was removed

while-loop--7d682e51-7c16-4f91-ae36-1c78.name: Ensure scan is clean
while-loop--7d682e51-7c16-4f91-ae36-1c78.description: Loop until the antivirus scan is confirmed as clean.

payload_removed.description: Indicates if the malicious payload was successfully removed.

scan_status.description: Indicates the status of the antivirus scan.
